clinical_history: Follow-up ultrasound for known liver lesion.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Right kidney demonstrates ill-defined, no hydronephrosis.
Thyroid gland shows coarse echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Liver appears mildly heterogeneous with no focal lesions.
Prostate is hypoechoic; volume approximately 15.66 cc.
